name: Underscore (MaskedIntrovert)
description:
Contest Description:
A short game made for the Halloween 2016 contest.

Controls:
Arrow keys and the C key for your light.

Project Details:
Built in Unity and based on using lightning and audio, it's a short experiment in the realm of exploration and anticipation.

Themes/Items:
The theme is Twisted Memories, and the two items are Golden keys and eyeless Teddy Bear (and no, I don't just mean the icon!)

A note that to see the whole game there are 6 keys in total.

Mechanics:
Each audio que (except the ambient music) in the game has significant mechanical important, so don't count anything as pointless.

Credits:
Music was used from:
http://www.purple-planet.com/horror/4583971268
